rows.label: bf10450100_0040
rows.name: I'm so glad to have met you.

rows.label: bf10450100_0050
rows.name:
Our time together was short...
A fraction of my long, long years.

rows.label: bf10450100_0060
rows.name:
But it's been warmer and brighter...
than any time I can remember before.

rows.label: bf10450100_0070
rows.name:
You shone a light on my melancholy path.
You showed me the way.

rows.label: bf10450100_0090
rows.name: Thank you for that gift of light.

rows.label: bf10450100_0100
rows.name:
So tell me...
How was it, being alive...?

rows.label: bf10450100_0110
rows.name:
Do you really wanna know?
Well...
